sentence.Network_en: Gandhian in both philosophy and physique, I have happily never been mistaken for a terrorist.
sentence.Network_cn: 虽然我的人生观和体格都是甘地主义式的,但令我高兴的是, 我从未被误认作恐怖分子.

means.word_mean: 1. of or relating to Mahatma Gandhi or his teachings

auth_sentence.content: I ask him why not, expecting some Gandhian philosophy of nonviolence underpinning the movement.
